trustedSolutions.category: FAMILY OWNED & OPERATED • PROUDLY SERVING LAFAYETTE, LOUISIANA
trustedSolutions.title: Lafayette's Trusted Equipment
trustedSolutions.description: As a family-owned business deeply rooted in Lafayette, Louisiana, we understand the unique needs of our local contractors and businesses. For years, our team has built lasting relationships based on trust, reliability, and exceptional service.
trustedSolutions.commitment: We take pride in treating your equipment as if it were our own. Our experienced technicians deliver prompt, professional service backed by our commitment to keeping your operations running smoothly. When you partner with Lafayette Equipment Rentals, you're not just another customer – you're part of our extended family.
services: ANSI, OSHA, and CSA Inspections & Certifications
trustedSolutions.testimonial: Lafayette Equipment Rentals delivers prompt repair service. We can routinely inspect your equipment and supply parts. Our team can fully manage your fleet so you can focus on what matters most: Getting the job done.

howItWorks.title: How do I rent equipment online?
steps: Browse our categories of equipment and enter your ZIP code to filter to the equipment rentals available near you. You'll see the daily, weekly and monthly (28 days) rates.
Choose the equipment and tools you need from Earthmoving, Aerial Work Platforms and Forklifts & Material Handling, then add them to your cart.
Go to your cart and fill out your worksite's location to see delivery and pick-up options.

Some equipment rentals such as large Trucks and Trailers may have special requirements like a CDL, class B or class C license according to your state's law. You will need to enter your driver's license information.
United Rentals offers special training for operators and provides best practices for our equipment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our equipment rental services, processes, and policies.

questions.question: Who and what is Lafayette Equipment Rentals?
questions.answer: Lafayette Equipment Rentals is a premier online platform that connects contractors and businesses with equipment rental companies across Louisiana. We partner with local, regional, and national rental companies to provide you with the widest selection of construction equipment available.

questions.question: What makes renting on Lafayette different?
questions.answer: Unlike traditional rental houses, Lafayette acts as your equipment broker. We shop the market for you, comparing prices and availability from multiple rental companies simultaneously. This gives you more options, better prices, and saves you time from calling around to different rental companies.

questions.question: What equipment is available on Lafayette?
questions.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of construction equipment including excavators, bulldozers, skid steers, loaders, cranes, lifts, generators, compressors, and much more. Our inventory includes equipment from top manufacturers like Bobcat, John Deere, Cat, Genie, JLG, and many others.

questions.question: Does Lafayette have any physical locations for me to visit?
questions.answer: Lafayette operates as an online platform, but we partner with local rental companies in your area. While we don't have physical locations, we work with established rental companies that do have local facilities for equipment pickup, delivery, and service.

questions.question: How many hours are included on my rental?
questions.answer: Most equipment rentals include 8-10 hours of operation per day. Extended hours may be available for an additional fee. Be sure to check the specific terms for your rental equipment, as hours and rates can vary by equipment type and rental company.

questions.question: How does Lafayette handle rental extensions?
questions.answer: Rental extensions are typically available if the equipment isn't already booked by another customer. Contact us at least 24 hours before your scheduled return date to request an extension. Additional charges will apply based on the daily rate.

questions.question: Does Lafayette provide rental equipment insurance?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive damage protection and liability insurance options. Our insurance coverage helps protect you against accidental damage, theft, and third-party liability. Coverage options and rates vary by equipment type and rental duration.

questions.question: Do I have to pay for delivery and pick up or can I haul the equipment myself?
questions.answer: Delivery and pickup services are available for most equipment. Rates vary based on distance and equipment size. Some smaller equipment can be self-hauled if you have the proper vehicle and trailer. Contact us for specific delivery options and pricing for your location.

questions.question: Does Lafayette do weekend delivery and pick up?
questions.answer: Weekend delivery and pickup availability varies by location and rental company. Some partners offer weekend services for an additional fee. Contact us to check weekend availability for your specific equipment and location needs.

faq.contactTeam: Our team is here to help you find the perfect equipment for your project. Contact us for personalized assistance.

hero.title: Locally Owned. Customer Focused.
hero.subtitle: Lafayette Equipment Rentals is your trusted partner for job-ready machinery across Southern Louisiana and the Acadiana region.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Built to Serve Contractors Like You
story.foundedText: Founded by a team of industry professionals and equipment operators, Lafayette Equipment Rentals was built with one goal: make heavy equipment accessible, fast, and hassle-free for contractors across Southern Louisiana.
story.localText: We know the challenges contractors face in the Acadiana region, and we built our rental platform to help you finish jobs on time and under budget. Our extensive network and local expertise ensure you get the right equipment when you need it.
story.industryText: Setting the standard in equipment rental throughout Lafayette and surrounding parishes.
story.communityText: Proud to serve Lafayette and contribute to the growth of our local economy.
story.familyText: We treat every customer like family, with honesty, integrity, and respect.

difference.title: What Makes Us Different
difference.subtitle: We're not just another rental company. We're your partners in getting the job done right.
difference.fastDeliveryText: Same-day delivery available throughout Lafayette and the Acadiana region.
difference.maintainedText: Reliable, job-ready equipment serviced by certified technicians.
difference.localExpertsText: Deep knowledge of Southern Louisiana's unique conditions and needs.
difference.responsiveSupportText: 24/7 support to keep your projects running smoothly.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From short-term rentals to long-term partnerships, we've got you covered.
services.equipmentRentalText: Wide selection of heavy machinery, tools, and equipment for any job size.
services.flexibleTermsText: Daily, weekly, monthly, or custom rental periods to fit your project timeline.
services.maintenanceSupportText: Full maintenance coverage and 24/7 support to keep your projects running.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our equipment rental services

hours.q: What are your hours of operation?
hours.a: Our Lafayette, LA location is open Monday to Saturday, 7 AM to 6 PM. Please call ahead for holiday hours or special closures.

holidays.q: Is Lafayette Equipment Rental Service open on holidays?
holidays.a: We are closed on major holidays such as New Year's Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day. For Lafayette-specific holiday hours, please contact our local office.

location.q: How can I find your Lafayette, LA location?
location.a: Visit us at 2865 Ambassador Caffery Pkwy, Ste 135, Lafayette, LA 70506, or check our website for directions and contact info.

reserve.q: How do I reserve equipment in Lafayette, LA?
reserve.a: You can reserve equipment online, by calling our Lafayette office, or by visiting us in person.

payment.q: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a: We accept all major credit cards, checks, and cash at our Lafayette location. Commercial accounts may qualify for credit terms.

deposit.a: A deposit may be required depending on the equipment and rental duration. Our Lafayette team will inform you at the time of reservation.

delivery.q: Do you offer equipment delivery in Lafayette, LA?
delivery.a: Yes, we offer delivery and pickup services throughout Lafayette and the surrounding areas. Fees vary based on distance and equipment size.

pickup.q: Can I pick up equipment myself?
pickup.a: Yes! Free pickup is available at our Lafayette location. Please bring a valid driver's license and an appropriate vehicle/trailer for transport.

lateReturn.q: What is your policy on late returns?
lateReturn.a: Equipment returned after the agreed-upon time may incur additional charges. Please call our Lafayette office if you anticipate a delay.

breakdown.q: What if the equipment breaks down during my rental?
breakdown.a: Contact our Lafayette, LA support line immediately. We offer 24/7 support and will arrange for repair or replacement as quickly as possible.

training.q: Do you provide training on equipment operation?
training.a: Basic operating instructions are provided with all rentals. For more comprehensive training, ask our Lafayette staff about available operator training programs.

faq.contactTeam: Our team is here to help. Contact us for more information.

ownerQuote.text: When you call us, you're not getting a call center. You're talking to someone who went to the same Friday night football games, knows where to get the best boudin, and understands exactly what you need to get the job done.
ownerQuote.author: Mike Thibodaux, Owner
